revised_title: On the Induction of Electric Currents and the Evolution of Electricity from Magnetism
tldr: This paper by Michael Faraday explores the induction of electric currents and the evolution of electricity from magnetism. He describes experiments involving helices, magnets, and voltaic batteries, and introduces the concept of the electro-tonic state. Faraday also explains the electromagnetic effect of induced electric currents in conductors due to the relative motion of magnets and conductors.
